name: Jamal Habibzai
story: Khalil was born in a small village in Iran, where he spent most of his childhood. He joined the Iranian military as soon as he turned 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his excellent performance in combat. After leaving the military, he joined the private military company hired by the OPFOR faction as a Recon Demo Specialist. Khalil is known for his calm and collected nature, making him an asset in high-pressure situations.
